name: Kumar Abhimanyu
jobTitle: DevOps Engineer at SAP Labs India | M.Tech SWE BITS Pilani
shortIntro: DevOps Engineer with experience in release management, automation, and cloud-native applications. Passionate about building scalable, reliable systems and continuous learning.
about: DevOps Engineer at SAP Labs India with a strong background in cloud-native applications, automation, and release management. Skilled in application containers, cloud, and DevOps tools. Holds an M.Tech in Computer Software Engineering from BITS Pilani.

responsibilities: Managing release cycles and coordinating with cross-functional teams.
Ensuring timely and quality releases for SAP products.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines and automated deployment processes.
Worked on cloud-native application development and infrastructure as code.
Contributed to DevOps initiatives and automation projects as a scholar.
Worked on data engineering tasks and supported analytics projects.

education.degree: Master of Technology - MTech, Computer Software Engineering
education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio built with React and deployed on GitHub Pages.
